mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: Minecraft Forge is a modding API used by alot of mods.

mod.name: CodeChickenLib
mod.description: Needed for ChickenBones mods

mod.name: ForgeMultipart
mod.description: Open source library for facilitation of multiple functional parts in the one block space.

mod.name: World Core
mod.description: Needed for Biomes O Plenty

mod.name: ejml
mod.description: A fast and easy to use dense matrix linear algebra library written in Java. Required for Ic2.

mod.name: ArmorStatusHUD
mod.description: Provides a HUD with your equipped armor/item stats.

mod.name: bspkrsCore
mod.description: Shared classes used in the mods maintained by bspkrs.

mod.name: DirectionHUD
mod.description: Provides a HUD with your magnetic compass heading.

mod.name: InGame Info XML
mod.description: Display extra information on top of your ingame screen.

mod.name: Laser Level
mod.description: In game ruler

mod.name: Stackie
mod.description: Stack entities into groups to decrease lag.

mod.name: StatusEffectHUD
mod.description: Shows active player effects (potions, etc) without opening your inventory!

mod.name: Damage Indicators
mod.description: Displays the damage you inflict on creatures, as well as current health, name and potion effects.

mod.name: Sort Fix
mod.description: Fixes issues with Liquids on servers due to a FML bug.

mod.name: Advanced Machines
mod.description: Yet another chunkloader mod.

mod.name: Advanced Repulsion Systems
mod.description: Adds FORCEFIELDS!

mod.name: Ars Magica 2
mod.description: A look into what Minecraft could become if you add a splash of magic...

mod.name: Applied Energistics
mod.description: A Mod About energy, and matter. Oh wait thats everything...

mod.name: Archimedes' Ships
mod.description: Craft and create your own ship... And sail it across the seven seas!

mod.name: Atomic Science
mod.description: A Minecraft mod about high end fission, fusion reactors and particle physics.

mod.name: Autoutils
mod.description: Utilities for mods by AUTOMATIC_MAIDEN.

mod.name: Backpack
mod.description: Provides the player with multiple, colored backpacks, which each has the space of a normal chest.

mod.name: BackTools
mod.description: Adds a bunch of hats, as wells as the ability to add more, into Minecraft

mod.name: AtomicStryker's Battletowers
mod.description: Giant Towers spawn all over the lands, featuring a vicious Mob infested Ascend leading up to an epic Boss Fight!

mod.name: Buildcraft Tools
mod.description: Adding chargeable tools and more to Buildcraft

mod.name: BdLib
mod.description: This is a collection of generic code used by bdew's other mods

mod.name: Chocolate Quest
mod.description: Improves adventure adding diverse dungeons ,mobs and loot

mod.name: BiblioCraft
mod.description: BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware! New in 1.3: Fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables and enchanted plates!

mod.name: BiblioWoods Biomes O'Plenty Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 16 varietys of wood from Biomes O'Plenty for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: BiblioWoods Forestry Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 24 varietys of wood from Forestry for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: BiblioWoods Natura Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 13 varietys of wood from Natura for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: Big Reactors
mod.description: Adds large, multiblock power generation machines to Minecraft. Compatible with Redstone Flux (RF) power. Special thanks: powercrystals, skyboy, King_Lemming, & Calclavia for example code.

mod.name: Extra Bees and Trees
mod.description: Extra Bees and Extra Trees are addons for Forestry which adds in new species of bees and trees as well as their by products and new machines.

mod.name: Biomes O' Plenty
mod.description: Adds 87 new, unique biomes!

mod.name: Blood Magic: Alchemical Wizardry
mod.description: Gruesome? Probably. Worth it? Definately!

mod.name: BuildCraft
mod.description: Extending Minecraft with pipes, auto-crafting, quarries, engines and much more!

mod.name: Calclavia Core
mod.description: Library required for Calclavia's mods.

mod.name: Carpenter's Blocks
mod.description: Adds slopes and a variety of vanilla-inspired blocks that support covers, side covers, overlays, dyes and chiseled patterns.

mod.name: Chat Bubbles
mod.description: This mod displays what people say above their head. Useful for crowded servers where the chat lines fly by. This way you can hold a conversation with people near you.

mod.name: ChickenChunks
mod.description: Advanced chunkloading management

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: Adds a chisel item that lets you carve blocks like cobblestone or sandstone. Adds two new blocks to world generation: marble and limestone, which can be be carved and crafted into many various building materials.

mod.name: Torojima's ChocoCraft
mod.description: Adds a mountable, breedable mob and supporting items.

mod.name: CodeChickenCore
mod.description: Core library for all ChickenBones mods

mod.name: CoFH Framework
mod.description: Framework required for all Team CoFH mods.

mod.name: Compact Solar Arrays
mod.description: Compact Solar Arrays, an Industrial Craft 2 mod that adds in three new Solar Panel type blocks.

mod.name: ComputerCraft
mod.description: ComputerCraft adds Computers, Programming and Robotics to Minecraft.

mod.name: CreeperCollateral
mod.description: Stops creepers destroying the items drops when they blow up.

mod.name: DartCraft
mod.description: DartCraft adds in a tonne of new features, machines and mecahnics to Minecraft all centered around Power Ore.

mod.name: denLib
mod.description: den's Library

mod.name: denlibfiles
mod.description: required for denlib.

mod.name: DenPipes
mod.description: This is a small addon for Buildcraft the implements various pipes that aid in making builds smarter and more compact.

mod.name: Dimensional Anchors
mod.description: Yet another chunkloader mod.

mod.name: DragonAPI
mod.description: DragonAPI is a function library and support mod which is relied upon by Reika's mods.

mod.name: Dynamic Lights
mod.description: Moving Lights aren't possible? OH RLY?

mod.name: Electrc Magic Tools
mod.description: IC2 tools that also magic.

mod.name: Emasher Resource
mod.description: Emasher Resource adds various ores and other resources to the game. All ores have retrogen, can be disabled, and their generation can be fully customized. The ores are for the most part, standard ores that you will find in most major mods. They might have fancy names, but they're all ore-dictionary-compatible with the ores, and ingots from other mods.

mod.name: Ender IO
mod.description: Compact conduits, painted things and access to your stuff through an eye of ender.

mod.name: Ender Storage
mod.description: EnderStorage is a mod that offers a means to store your items in The END, causing them to be everywhere and nowhere at the same time. All EnderStorage makes use of the magic of colors to link storage with its little piece of The END. Any EnderStorage with the same color code share inventory (even across dimensions).

mod.name: EngineersToolbox
mod.description: Engineer's Toolbox adds completely customizable modular machines that allow you to add modules to a base block to create much more complex devices. There are modules that do everything from redstone logic, to killing mobs, to creating infinite water sources, and a whole lot more.

mod.name: Enhanced Portals 3
mod.description: Custom Portals

mod.name: Equivalent Exchange 3
mod.description: Transmuting items into another.

mod.name: ExpandedRedstone
mod.description: Expanded Redstone adds a few machines and tools that make redstone more useful and powerful. They are designed to "feel" like vanilla, but work just as well in a heavily modded environment.

mod.name: ExtraCells
mod.description: A Mod that adds 4 new ME Storage Cells and some other cool stuff to AE.

mod.name: Extra Utilities
mod.description: Just a bunch of fairly useful things

mod.name: Factorization
mod.description: Auto-crafting, ore processing, barrels, and other toys

mod.name: Flat Signs
mod.description: FlatSigns provides new sign functionality allowing signs to be placed flat on the ceiling or the floor (via sneak click). You can also make sponges to edit existing signs.

mod.name: Forestry
mod.description: Trees, bees and more.

mod.name: Galacticraft Core
mod.description: An advanced space travel mod for Minecraft 1.6

mod.name: Galacticraft Mars
mod.description: Mars addon for Galacticraft.

mod.name: GasCraft
mod.description: GasCraft is an official addon for Engineer's Toolbox. GasCraft adds several gases to the game, all with different uses.

mod.name: GateCopy
mod.description: This mod adds a clipboard item that can copy the settings from a Buildcraft Gate and paste those settings onto another similar gate.

mod.name: Geostrata
mod.description: Adds realistic rocks to world generation.

mod.name: GraviGun
mod.description: Adds the HL2 Gravity Gun to Minecraft

mod.name: Greg's Lighting
mod.description: Greg's Lighting is a mod for the game Minecraft. It provides Floodlights, high-powered lamps designed for lighting up large spaces. A floodlight projects a beam of light that extends for up to 64 blocks without diminishing in brightness. You can place them on the ceiling of a high room and they will light up the floor as bright as day.

mod.name: GregTech-Addon
mod.description: This Addon adds the awesome Technology of GregTech-Intergalactical to your World! Fusionreactors, Lightningrods and many other Technologies and convenient Recipes are added by this Addon, if you let them enabled in the allmighty Config, of course

mod.name: Hunger Overhaul
mod.description: Hunger mechanics overhauled

mod.name: IC2 Fixes
mod.description: Fixes broken recipes in IC2

mod.name: Nuclear Control
mod.description: Nuclear Control, an Industrial Craft 2 addon that allows you to build efficient monitoring and notification system for your nuclear reactor. Also you can use Howler Alarm and Industrial Alarm in any case when you want industrial-style notification/alarming system.

mod.name: iChunUtil
mod.description: Shared library mod required by several of iChun's Mods.

mod.name: Immibis Core
mod.description: This is like CodeChicken Core, Buildcraft Core, RedPower Core, and so on - it provides requirements for other mods.

mod.name: Immibis's Microblocks
mod.description: They mostly work like RedPower 2's microblocks.

mod.name: IndustrialCraft 2
mod.description: Industrial age themed expansion for Minecraft.

mod.name: Infinity Bow Fix
mod.description: Removes the need for a single arrow in the inventory when using an "Infinity I" enchanted bow.

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: Iron Chest
mod.description: New chests with larger sizes, with in-place upgrade items.

mod.name: JABBA
mod.description: Just Another Better Barrel Attempt. Attempts to make barrels better.

mod.name: kris91268's Light Bridges and Doors
mod.description: Adds bridges and doors made of light! as well as a couple of other things. Apply a redstone signal to activate the light bridges and doors, and they extend out for whatever you configure it to be!

mod.name: Logistics Pipes
mod.description: Logistics Pipes is an extensive overhaul of the Buildcraft pipe system. It allows for better distribution of items via pipes, more organised stockkeeping and easier automated crafting.

mod.name: Magical Crops
mod.description: Every get bored of mining all the time for resources? Want a new way of collecting them? Magical Crops gives you the ability to grow your own resources! Grow Diamonds, Coal, Emeralds or even Experience, Now go and create a vast farm for all your needs!

mod.name: Minecraft Comes Alive
mod.description: No more squidward-villagers! Interact with male and female human villagers and raise a family.

mod.name: Mekanism
mod.description: Energy, Armor, Tools, Weapons, Machines, Magic.

mod.name: MekanismGenerators
mod.description: Generators module of Mekanism.

mod.name: MekanismTools
mod.description: Tools module for Mekanism.

mod.name: Micdoodle8 Core
mod.description: Provides core features of Micdoodle8's mods

mod.name: MineFactory Reloaded
mod.description: Automate everything!

mod.name: Advanced Solar Panels
mod.description: Advanced solar panels is new generation of using solar power. This is addon for IndustrialCraft 2

mod.name: Gravitation Suite
mod.description: Gravitation Suite give you ability to fly. This is addon for IndustrialCraft 2

mod.name: Modular Forcefield System
mod.description: Adds forcefields and security related blocks.

mod.name: MachineMuse's Modular Powersuits
mod.description: A mod which adds modular power armor, power tool, and a tinker table to configure them. Uses UniversalElectricty or IC2 for energy.

mod.name: Morph
mod.description: Morph mod, made for ModJam 2. Allows players to acquire the morph skill and turn into other mobs.

mod.name: Mystcraft
mod.description: Mystcraft brings elements from the Myst series of games and books to Minecraft, as well as allowing players to actually write and travel to their own Ages.

mod.name: Natura
mod.description: Heyo, Redwood trees! Chop them all day long!

mod.name: NEI Addons
mod.description: Adds in mod integration into NEI by showing bee breeding information as well as other helpful mod plugins.

mod.name: NEI Plugins
mod.description: Adds mod integration into NEI

mod.name: Nether Ores
mod.description: Introduces mineable yet dangerous ores to the Nether

mod.name: NotEnoughItems
mod.description: Allows you to quickly and easily look up recipes and uses for any item in Minecraft included modded items. Also allows easy spawning of items and a range of one click utilities.

mod.name: Not Enough Keys
mod.description: A very simple mod created to clean up and organize the keybinds gui, organizing mods into their own category and sub menu.

mod.name: No Voidfog No Dimming
mod.description: Removes void fog and dimming

mod.name: Numina
mod.description: A common library of useful functions and utilities for dealing with Minecraft's source code.

mod.name: Obsidian Pressure Plates
mod.description: Provides pressure plates that can only be activated by players (plus NPC, quiet and shrouded variants).

mod.name: OpenBlocks
mod.description: OpenBlocks is a random collection of ideas - ideas the community have suggested, or ideas we thought "Why hasn't anyone done that yet?". There is no theme, it's quite random. It's not even just blocks, as the name suggests!

mod.name: OpenComputers
mod.description: Adds computers that run lua.

mod.name: OpenMods Lib
mod.description: This is required for all of OpenBlocks mods.

mod.name: OpenPeripheral Addons
mod.description: Adds extra items for OpenPeripherals

mod.name: OpenPeripheral Core
mod.description: Allows nearly any block to become a computercraft peripheral.

mod.name: Pam's Clay Spawn
mod.description: This mod adds in clay deposits underground with the frequency and density of iron deposits.

mod.name: Pam's Harvestcraft
mod.description: Expanded food system including tons of new crops!

mod.name: Plugins For Forestry
mod.description: Plugins For Forestry's goal is to add additional interconnected content between other Forge mods and SirSengir's Forestry.

mod.name: PortalGun
mod.description: Add the portal gun and many other portal elements into Minecraft.

mod.name: PowerCrystals Core
mod.description: Mod needed for PowerCrystals Mods

mod.name: Powersuits Addons
mod.description: Addons for Modular Powersuits

mod.name: Project Red Core
mod.description: Redstone. The way it was meant to be.

mod.name: Project Red Compat
mod.description: Redstone. The way it was meant to be.

mod.name: Project Red Integration
mod.description: Redstone. The way it was meant to be.

mod.name: Project Red Lighting
mod.description: Redstone. The way it was meant to be.

mod.name: Project Red Mechanical
mod.description: Redstone. The way it was meant to be.

mod.name: Project Red World
mod.description: Redstone. The way it was meant to be.

mod.name: qCraft
mod.description: Quantum Mechanics meets Minecraft!

mod.name: QuarryPlus
mod.description: This mod add advanced quarry and more.

mod.name: Railcraft
mod.description: Redefine your rails

mod.name: Random Things
mod.description: Random Things packed into one Mod :D

mod.name: Redstone Arsenal
mod.description: Redstone Arsenal adds several new items used to create powerful tools.

mod.name: Xeno's Reliquary
mod.description: Two words: magical swag. Oh, and a gun.

mod.name: Remote IO
mod.description: The Remote IO's can be linked to any block with an inventory... imagine this: four separate quarries all outputting into a unique Remote IO linked to a single chest. Gone are the days of pipes! You are also able to link the Remote IO to machines and even use them with fluids!

mod.name: RogueLike Dungeons
mod.description: Adds more dungeons

mod.name: The SecretRoomsMod
mod.description: This mod adds a variety of cool blocks that camouflage themselves to the surrounding world. All of these blocks have extremely useful functions that allow you to simply hide your diamonds, or punish all who dare try to get to them. Hidden doors, pressure plates, hidden levers and more!

mod.name: Slick-Util
mod.description: Slick-Util is a small library to enable you to load various image, sound and font formats for use with LWJGL.

mod.name: Soul Shards Reborn
mod.description: Recreation of the Old Soul Shards mod.

mod.name: Steve's Carts 2
mod.description: Steve's Carts 2 introduces a modular system where you can build a huge amount of carts(hundreds of millions) by combining the parts you want.

mod.name: Steve's Factory Manager
mod.description: This mod allows you to move items between different inventories (machines and storage blocks) by specifying it using commands in a flow chart like way.

mod.name: Switches
mod.description: Switches provides alternative switch designs and lever/switch piston-activation.

mod.name: Sync
mod.description: This mod provides clones, or as we like to call it, 'shells'. These shells are basically a new individual, with their own inventory, experience level, and even gamemode.

mod.name: Tinkers' Construct
mod.description: A little of this, a little of that, a lot of tinkering, and a lot of tools

mod.name: Thaumcraft
mod.description: Adding a touch of magic to Minecraft

mod.name: Thaumic Tinkerer
mod.description: An addon to Thaumcraft 4, implementing new content. This mod is a spiritual successor to Elemental Tinkerer. Researches that come from this mod are prefixed by [TT]. Build 24.

mod.name: Thermal Expansion
mod.description: Expanding Minecraft thermally - provides new options for automation and processing!

mod.name: Tinkers' Mechworks
mod.description: Addon for Tinkers Construct

mod.name: Translocator
mod.description: Translocates stuff!

mod.name: Tubes
mod.description: Tubes aims to provide the best item transport and sorting solution using the awesome ForgeMultipart API These tubes work somewhat like the pneumatic tubes in RedPower, but there are many more types of tubes for all sorts of uses.

mod.name: Tubestuff
mod.description: A collection of blocks that are useful with BuildCraft or RedPower.

mod.name: The Twilight Forest
mod.description: An enchanted forest dimension.

mod.name: Underground Biomes Constructs
mod.description: Adds underground biomes composed of layers of new rock types

mod.name: Universal Electricity Core
mod.description: Universal Electricity API

mod.name: Vein Miner
mod.description: A mod to help mine veins of ores by mining blocks of the same type in a chain reaction, giving you the blocks at the end. It is inspired by Connected Destruction by Bspkrs.

mod.name: Vending
mod.description: Adds a vending block that lets you sell items.

mod.name: Waila
mod.description: Waila is an extension for NEI. It will show in the tooltip what mod an item is from. Since the tooltip contains the mod name, you can also easly parse items per mods.

mod.name: Balkon's WeaponMod
mod.description: Throw a spear in a zombie's head! Cut a skeleton in half with your brand new halberd!Shoot some slimes in pieces with an old musket! And more!

mod.name: Witchery
mod.description: Extending Minecraft with witchcraft.

mod.name: WR-CBE Core
mod.description: Redstone Ether with some component items

mod.name: Zan's Minimap
mod.description: Zan's Minimap, also known as VoxelMap, is a minimap for Minecraft supporting waypoints, rotating minimap and entity tracking.
